website_summaries.verdict: Nice flavor and portable pouches. Although this flavored water contains some sugar, it's worth a try for the convenience factor.
pros: Comes in tasty fruit flavors in flexible pouches that the brand is known for, which are easy to put in lunch bags
cons: Contains a little sugar and stevia, which may leave a weird aftertaste
However, many consumers report they enjoy the taste

customer_reviews.title: Blecch!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is okay and it tastes pretty sugary and sweet but that is to be expected since it has artificial sweetener in it. I actually wouldn’t have bought it if I had noticed the artificial sweetener as an ingredient. I managed my way through half the box and then couldn’t deal with it any longer. Too sweet and I got headaches. Also, it doesn’t taste like actual strawberry or kiwi, just the industry standard flavor of “strawberry-kiwi”. Not tangy or tart at all.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: These Were a Hit
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit at my 90s party! I just recommend doing away with the mini straws, though. These days, we really need to use reusable metal straws. I have plenty of metal straws, so the single-use plastic straws that come with Capri Suns are useless to me & just a waste of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids lunches
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for the kids lunches or when we are jumping in the car. They have the see through window at the bottom so we can view to make sure the liquid is clear. Overall my kids do like the regular capri sun better than the waters but this is a good choice with less sugar.
customer_reviews.author: twins mom 22

customer_reviews.title: Normal Capri suns for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I’m a college student and I’ll be honest, I bought this just because of the price at the time and I’m SF everything is so expensive so I bought this just because. And I loved them as a kid so I said hell I’ll get some more. I forgot how sweet they were and they are great don’t get me wrong. I think I’m just older now and they’re too sweet for me. But they are really convenient and I’m sure are great for kids still for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer vega

customer_reviews.title: Better than HiC
customer_reviews.text: I drink these, I’m 29.... it’s my favorite, I remember my mother use to buy these or HiC... when I was in elementary school. I prefer these.
customer_reviews.author: Rubayath Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grab and go
customer_reviews.text: perfect for on the go to bring a whole box when I'm going somewhere. My kids love all of the flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Sons favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my youngest sons favorite flavor/ brand. He takes 2 every day for lunch, needless to say we go through a whole lot of them around here! Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Taste
customer_reviews.text: It was surely sweetened with stevia leaf extract, but they do taste good and the bottom of the capri sun drinks are clear for you to see there's no dyes. Especially helpful in case there may be mold
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Story

customer_reviews.title: Not my flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This flavor was Not good at All!! Tasted like sugar free. We like wild cherry!!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: ‘
customer_reviews.text: Good taste and value. Better than soda pop for a refreshing drink for your child’
customer_reviews.author: KrisTina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 4 out of 5 because the kids don't like this flavor as much as the others.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great low sugar, much better for kids than those sugary juices.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA LUCERO

customer_reviews.title: Capri Sun is a great refreshing drink
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most of this drink is how it cools you down. The only thing I can think of to the least is not enough in that little pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: sugar is sugar is sugar
customer_reviews.text: I realize stevia might not be "artificial" but it's still nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I'll be buying again soon
customer_reviews.text: This is always good for the kids that won't drink water,it tricks the taste buds to think it is juice
customer_reviews.author: s.wright

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing taste of aspartame
customer_reviews.text: Has an artificial sweetener flavor to it. I checked the ingredients and it fits not say there is one. The package says real fruit juice but it does taste dietetic and I cannot stand the taste of aspartame. I will not be purchasing this particular flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: SuzAnne

customer_reviews.title: Great juice!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved them! They will go through a box so quickly lol. I’ve tasted myself and they are tasteful!
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Love our food boxes
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos love getting “food boxes” in the mail. I always include some of these for them
customer_reviews.author: Torihuffman

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like flavored water
customer_reviews.text: Very thirst-quenching and tasty. Tastes like flavored water, not juice, so it's very light and not at all sickly sweet. Really wish Amazon would stock this again!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tanaka
